titleStmt.title: A discourse of the medicine called mithridatium declaring the firste beginninge, the temperament, the noble vertues, and the true vse of the same: compiled rather for those which are to vse it, then for the learned.
titleStmt.author: Baley, Walter, 1529-1592.
